Welcome
-------

Uikitty is a light-weight interface framework built to run on Drupal 8 CMS.
UIkitty works as a bridge between UIkit and Drupal 8. There are currently 2
versions of UIkitty being developed. Version 2.x is recommended for production
sites and is more complete. Version 3.x is brand new and under active
development. Version 3.x issues are managed at Gitlab.

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 2

    self
    2.x/index
    3.x/index
